title: High ping
body: I'm getting extremely high ping now-a-days, ranging from **198-302**. It is damn tough for me to play with these high pings! Can anyone tell me how can I reduce these high pings? Is there a website for this or is it something only Riot can do? Due to this, I usually disconnect from the game automatically without me even hitting the close button! Then, I'm marked** AFK and LeaveBuster**! Can anyone _plz_ answer the questions?

replies.body:
There are some programs that say they help reduce ping. Things such as "[What The Fast](http://www.wtfast.com/)" and the like. You could try them.

Its free but you have to sit through an Ad eveytime you use it (or you can pay for the ad-free version).

If its happening in other games though, you might want to call your ISP.
